name: Swift
display_help: You can naturally run slightly faster than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance.

name: Hurdle
display_help: You can naturally jump higher than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance.

name: Health
display_help: You heal slightly faster than a normal person. Your improved Health also grants you resistance to Sleep. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance.

name: Stamina
display_help: You recover Endurance slightly more quickly than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on, and will cause smashing damage to your target. Brawl also features a synergy with the Fighting pool. If you have trained Boxing or Kick, Brawl will also reduce the target's attack speed and chance to hit. The strength of this effect increases if both Boxing and Kick are owned. If you have trained Cross Punch, Brawl will also reduce the target's regeneration and recovery. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Engagement
display_help: You can naturally run slightly faster than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance.

name: prestige_generic_Sprintp
display_help: Sprint allows you to travel, or run away, slightly faster than normal, while slightly draining your Endurance.

name: prestige_preorder_Sprintp
display_help: Sprint allows you to travel, or run away, slightly faster than normal, while slightly draining your Endurance.

name: prestige_BestBuy_Sprintp
display_help: Sprint allows you to travel, or run away, slightly faster than normal, while slightly draining your Endurance.

name: prestige_EB_Sprintp
display_help: Sprint allows you to travel, or run away, slightly faster than normal, while slightly draining your Endurance.

name: prestige_Gamestop_Sprintp
display_help: Sprint allows you to travel, or run away, slightly faster than normal, while slightly draining your Endurance.

name: prestige_DVD_Glidep
display_help: Forms a frictionless field of energy beneath the user that allows rapid transit while remaining close to the ground.

name: prestige_Jump_Pack_Temp
display_help: This Jump Pack grants you the ability to not only jump great distances, but also jump and gain altitude in mid air! The Jump Pack will automatically shut down after 30 seconds of continuous use.

name: prestige_Pocket_D_VIP_Pass
display_help: You've been given a VIP Pass to Pocket D. It will allow you to access Pocket D from anywhere. It is usable once every 30 minutes.

name: prestige_Base_Teleport
display_help: You have a Base Transport beacon. It will allow you to return to your base from any location. It is usable once every 30 minutes.

name: prestige_Mission_Teleport
display_help: You have a Mission Transport beacon. It will allow you to teleport to your active mission's entrance.

name: prestige_Iron_Man
display_help: You are a true Iron Man. You persistence and stamina have resulted in your Max Hit Points and Max Endurance increasing by 10%.

name: prestige_Permanent_Undead_Slaying_Axe
display_help: This massive weapon was specifically crafted by MAGI to slay the undead. Note that Mastermind Henchmen are protected from this effect. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Ghost Slaying Axe. Damage: Moderate
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Bonus vs True Undead

name: prestige_Permanent_Nemesis_Staff
display_help: This strange, steam-powered staff shoots a bolt of energy that deals damage, knocks back foes. The Nemesis is particularly effective when wielded by Technology, Science or Natural origin individuals. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Nemesis Staff. Damage: Moderate

name: prestige_Permanent_Sands_of_Mu
display_help: You have found some strange black sand. While carrying it, you have the ability to deal a flurry of punches charged with the Negative Energy of the Netherworld. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Sands of Mu. Damage: High

name: prestige_Permanent_Blackwand
display_help: This black metal wand feels cold in your hand, and glows with dark arcane energies. When used by Magic, Mutant or Natural origin individuals, the potency of its attacks are increased. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to Blackwand. Damage: Moderate

name: prestige_Permanent_Nemesis_Staff_54
display_help: This strange, steam-powered staff shoots a bolt of energy that deals damage, knocks back foes.Damage enhancing powers do not apply to the Nemesis Staff. Damage: Moderate

name: prestige_Permanent_Blackwand_54
display_help: This black metal wand feels cold in your hand, and glows with dark arcane energies. Damage enhancing powers do not apply to Blackwand. Damage: Moderate

name: prestige_Rikti_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a Rikti Monkey. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_Demon_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a small Demon, complete with wings. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_MekMan_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a Mek Man. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_Redcap_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a Redcap Rascal. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_Clockwork_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a Clockwork Sprocket. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_Wolf_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to call a German Shepherd companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_BlackWolf_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to call a Black Wolf companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_True_Wolf_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to call a Wolf companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_Fairy_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Faerie helper from the Lost Lands. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your endurance recovery and defense. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_DarkFairy_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Faerie helper from the Lost Lands. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your damaging abilities and your resilience to damage. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_BlueWisp_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Wisp helper from the Lost Lands. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your endurance recovery and defense. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_RedWisp_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Wisp helper from the Lost Lands. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your damaging abilities and your resilience to damage. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_ShieldOscillator_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Clockwork Oscillator. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your endurance recovery and defense. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_PowerOscillator_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Clockwork Oscillator. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your damaging abilities and your resilience to damage. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_ShieldDrone_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Vanguard Shield Drone. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your endurance recovery and defense. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_PowerDrone_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Vanguard Power Drone. It will follow you around and help you by increasing your damaging abilities and your resilience to damage. It's fragile, though, and will flee if attacked.

name: prestige_Cherub_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a classical Cherub in a toga. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_Leprechaun_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a tiny Leprechaun. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_Cat_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a mystical liger companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_Lion_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a mighty lion companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_Lioness_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a powerful lioness companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_Wellemental_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a humanoid homage to the Well of the Furies, from which Statesman and Lord Recluse drank to acquire their great power. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.
display_short_help: Summon Image of the Well Pet

name: prestige_Spider_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a spider companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_Direwolf_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a legendary Winter Wolf companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_NightstalkerJackal_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a Shadow Hound companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_NightstalkerPanther_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to summon a shadowy Spirit Panther companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_Coyote_Pet
display_help: You can use this power to call a Coyote companion to accompany you. It cannot be damaged and will not engage in combat.

name: prestige_Frost_Knight
display_help: You can use this power to call a loyal Hamidon Bud companion to accompany you. It's very cute!

name: Team_Transporter
display_help: Activating this power will summon a vehicle that will allow your party to teleport to the active mission. This power cannot be activated while on a PvP or mission map.

name: prestige_Team_Recall
display_help: This power allows you to teleport all of your teammates to your location.

name: prestige_SelfRez
display_help: If you are defeated, you may return to battle empowered by the effects of several types of large inspirations! After each use, you may not use this effect again for another hour.
display_short_help: Self Rez, Debt Protection, +Large Inspiration Effects

name: Renewal_of_Light
display_help: A guardian spirit watches over you. If you are defeated, activating this power will restore you so you may continue the battle. The restoration blasts nearby foes with an explosion, knocking them down and Disorienting them. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. You will be invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.

name: SnowBall
display_help: Can be used on friend and foe alike. Although there are no lasting effects when these frozen missiles are hurled, who doesn't love throwing a snowball. Happy Holidays!

name: Mini_SnowBeast
display_help: You can use this power to create a solidified hologram of a Mini SnowBeast. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: Vanguard_MVAS
display_help: You can use this power to summon a miniature replica of a Vanguard HVAS. It will follow you around wherever you go. Great for parties!

name: prestige_InspirationGrant
display_help: You can look deep within yourself to find the inspiration necessary to overcome any obstacle. Using this power will award the player with 3 inspirations. Once used, you will be prevented from using this power again for 30 minutes.

name: Target:LKT-1700_Rocket_Pack
display_help: Delusion, Inc., the same company that makes all of Rose Star's gadgets, has mass-produced the LKT-1700 ducted-fan jet pack. This stylish jet pack endows you with the power of Flight.

name: LKT_Remover
display_help: Removes the LKT Rocket Pack when the Auth Bit expires.

name: prestige_Permanent_SelfDestruction
display_help: You explode! In doing so, you create a massive explosion which deals extreme damage to all foes in a large radius. Damage: Extreme,
display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing/Fire), Foe KB, Self Kill

name: Mystic_Fortune
display_help: You can read the fortune of any player. This grants a random permanent buff for 20 minutes, and they may not have their fortune read again during that time.

name: Secondary_Mutation
display_help: You acquire a secondary mutation. This grants a random permanent buff for up to 20 minutes. No more than one Secondary Mutation can be in place at a time.

name: prestige_reveal
display_help: Your extensive knowledge of your surroundings will allow you to clear the "Fog of War" from any map once every 5 minutes.

name: Prestige_Ninja_Run
display_help: A combination of quickness and acrobatic grace, Ninja Run allows you to move at high speed, whether on the ground or leaping from rooftop to rooftop. This power is not as fast as Super Speed, nor will it allow you to jump as well as Super Leap, however it is considerably better than the Fitness powers Swift and Hurdle.

name: Prestige_Beast_Run
display_help: Show off your bestial nature by using this power. This power is not as fast as Super Speed, nor will it allow you to jump as well as Super Leap, however it is considerably better than the Fitness powers Swift and Hurdle.

name: Prestige_Steam_Jump
display_help: Your steam powered jump pack grants you the ability to not only jump great distances, but also jump and gain altitude in mid air! The steam powered jump pack will automatically shut down after 30 seconds of continuous use.

name: Alt_Hover_Board
display_help: You mount a Rocket Board allowing you to fly at great speeds. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation. This power also grants the you a measure of flight protection making you less likely to be knocked out of the sky by some enemy attacks.

name: Alt_Magic_Carpet
display_help: You hop aboard a flying carpet allowing you to fly around with tremendous speed. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation. This power also grants the you a measure of flight protection making you less likely to be knocked out of the sky by some enemy attacks.

name: Alt_Void_Skiff
display_help: You mount a Void Skiff allowing you to fly at great speeds. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation. This power also grants the you a measure of flight protection making you less likely to be knocked out of the sky by some enemy attacks.

name: Alt_Coyote_Travel_Power
display_help: You transform into a coyote granting you increased movement speed and jump height. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation.

name: Alt_Cheetah_Travel_Power
display_help: You transform into a cheetah granting you greatly increased movement speed and a slight increase to jump height. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation.

name: Alt_Panther_Travel_Power
display_help: You transform into a Panther granting you increased movement speed and a slight boost to your jump height. However, while this power is active you will be unable to activate most powers. Additionally this power will deactivate most powers upon activation.

name: Alt_Frisbee_Granter
display_help: Use this power to throw a Flying Disc to a friend! This will grant them a use of the Flying Disc power. You have an infinite number of Flying Discs that can be thrown to friends, although friends can only have 1 copy of the Flying Disc power at a time.

name: Walk
display_help: Activating this power enables you to walk at a relaxed pace. You will not be able to activate most powers while walking.

name: Shadowy_Presence
display_help: Activating this power shifts you into a semi-real shadow-state. So long as you are not attacked and remain motionless, you will have extremely good stealth rating and be nearly invisible. This power has a long, interruptible cast time and always takes 5 minutes to recharge. This power provides no benefit in PvP or in PvP zones.

name: Event_PPD_Hardsuit
display_help: This costume will let you dress up in a Paragon Police Hard Suit at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted. Thank you for joining us at PAX!

name: Event_Freakshow_Boss
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as a Freakshow Boss at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted. Thank you for joining us at Comic-Con!

name: Event_Harlequin
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as a Harlequin at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted. Thank you for joining us at the City of Heroes Community Fan Event!

name: Event_RingMistress
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as a Carnival of Shadows Ring Mistress at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_KoA
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as a member of the Knives of Artemis at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Goldbricker
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Praetorian Clockwork at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Ghoul
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Ghouls at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Cop
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Praetorian Police Department at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Rikti
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Rikti at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Vahzilok
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of Vahzilok's creations at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Coralax
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Coralax at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Olympian
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Olympian Guard at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Victoria
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Mk-VI "Victorias" at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Ranger
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the IDF Rangers at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Talon
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Talons of Vengeance Huntresses at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_RuluShin
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as one of the Rulu-Shin at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Event_Riptide
display_help: This costume will let you dress up as Riptide of the IDF at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.

name: Sprint
display_help: Sprint allows you to travel, or run away, slightly faster than normal, while slightly draining your Endurance.

name: Rest
display_help: Activate Rest to heal Hit Points and recover Endurance. While Resting you cannot attack, and you are extremely vulnerable to attack and damage. Activation of Rest can be interrupted, and the power must be active for a few seconds before you start to recuperate. Recharge: Slow

name: Fitness_Fix
display_help: You recover Endurance slightly more quickly than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Fitness Powers before selecting Stamina.

name: Vision_Phase
display_help: Special

name: Energy_Flight
display_help: Energy Flight allows you to travel large distances quickly. If you attack a target while this power is on, your flight speed will be temporarily reduced. Your Energy Flight speed increases with your Level.

name: Cosmic_Balance
display_help: Kheldians naturally thrive off the energy and essence of their teammates. Peacebringers' metamorphic nature allows them to bring balance to their team. Your Damage will increase for each nearby Tanker, Mastermind, Corruptor or Defender teammate. Your Damage Resistance will increase for each nearby Scrapper, Brute, Stalker or Blaster teammate. Each nearby Controller or Dominator teammate will grant you limited Protection from Control effects. Finally, each nearby Peacebringer, Warshade, or teamed Arachnos Soldier or Widow grants you some resistance to attack time slow effects. You cannot put Enhancements in this power.

name: Combat_Flight
display_help: For hovering and aerial combat. This power is much slower than Energy Flight, but provides some Defense, offers good air control, costs little Endurance, and has none of the penalties associated with Energy Flight. Switch to this mode when fighting other flying foes.

name: Shadow_Step
display_help: You can Teleport long distances. Shadow Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

name: Dark_Sustenance
display_help: Kheldians naturally thrive off the energy and essence of their teammates. Warshades' absorbing nature allows them to draw on the power of their teammates' power to increase their own. Your Damage Resistance will increase for each nearby Tanker, Mastermind, Corruptor or Defender teammate. Your Damage will increase for each nearby Scrapper, Stalker, Brute or Blaster teammate. Each nearby Controller or Dominator teammate will grant you limited Protection from Control effects. Finally, each nearby Peacebringer, Warshade, or teamed Arachnos Soldier or Widow grants you some resistance to attack time slow effects. You cannot put Enhancements in this power.

name: Shadow_Recall
display_help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate or leaguemate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. Range is not infinite, but extremely long and can be enhanced. This power can be interrupted. Recharge: Fast

name: Bright_Nova_Bolt
display_help: A very quick, but low damage bolt of Kheldian energy that can reduce a target's defense. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Bright_Nova_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Bright Nova Bolt. Bright Nova Blast sends a focused blast of Kheldian energy at a foe that can knock him back and reduce his defense. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast

name: Bright_Nova_Scatter
display_help: Bright Nova Scatter sends bolts of Kheldian light energy to multiple targets at once within a cone area in front of the caster. Bright Nova Scatter deals moderate energy damage to each affected target and reduces their defense. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: Moderate. Recharge: Slow

name: Bright_Nova_Detonation
display_help: You hurl a large blast of Kheldian light energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target, reducing their defense. Some affected targets may get knocked back. This power is only available while in Bright Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

name: White_Dwarf_Strike
display_help: The White Dwarf Strike is a moderate melee attack that releases Kheldian light on impact, which can Knock Down foes, and reduce a target's Defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast

name: White_Dwarf_Smite
display_help: White Dwarf Smite is powerful melee attack that can often Disorient or Knock Down opponents. White Dwarf Smite can also bring down fliers, and reduce their defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Fast

name: White_Dwarf_Flare
display_help: You channel the might of your Kheldian energy into the very Earth itself. The ground erupts and cracks with luminous energy, blasting all nearby foes, knocking them back and reducing their defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback

name: White_Dwarf_Sublimation
display_help: Through perfect control of your body and energy, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Recharge: Slow

name: White_Dwarf_Step
display_help: White Dwarfs can Teleport long distances. White Dwarf Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

name: White_Dwarf_Antagonize
display_help: This power attracts the attention of a foe and all those around him. Use this to pull villains off of an ally in trouble. An Accuracy check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

name: Dark_Nova_Bolt
display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack that lowers your target's attack and movement speed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Dark_Nova_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Dark Nova Bolt. Dark Nova Blast sends focused negative Nictus energy at a foe. This attack can knock down foes and will leave the targets' attack and movement speed slowed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Dark_Nova_Emanation
display_help: Sends bolts of Nictus dark energy to multiple targets at once within a cone area in front of the caster. Deals moderate negative energy damage to each affected foe and reduces their attack rate and movement speed. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate. Recharge: Slow

name: Dark_Nova_Detonation
display_help: You hurl a blast of Dark Matter that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. All affected targets' attack and movement speed are slowed. Some foes may be knocked down. This power is only available while in Dark Nova Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Knockback, -Recharge, -SPD

name: Black_Dwarf_Strike
display_help: The Black Dwarf Strike is a moderate melee attack that releases Nictus Dark Energy on impact, which can Knock Down foes, and slows a targets attack and movement speed. This power is only available while in Black Dwarf Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Black_Dwarf_Smite
display_help: Black Dwarf Smite is powerful melee attack that can often Disorient or Knock Down opponents. Black Dwarf Smite can also bring down fliers, and slows a targets attack and movement speed. This power is only available while in Black Dwarf Form. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Fast

name: Black_Dwarf_Drain
display_help: You tap the primal forces of your Nictus power to create an Essence Draining conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes drained in this manner have their attack and movement speed reduced. This power is only available while in Black Dwarf Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Black_Dwarf_Mire
display_help: Black Dwarf Mire can drain the essence of all nearby foes, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Black_Dwarf_Step
display_help: Black Dwarfs can Teleport long distances. Black Dwarf Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

name: Black_Dwarf_Antagonize
display_help: This power attracts the attention of a foe and all those around him. Use this to pull villains off of an ally in trouble. An Accuracy check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

name: Defiance_old
display_help: As a Blaster looses health, he begins to unleash his true power in a last ditch display of Defiance. The less health he has, the more damage he deals and the more accurate his attacks become.

name: Defiance
display_help: Blasters' earliest abilities come so naturally to them, that they are accessible even in states that normally prevent them from using powers, such as being Held, Slept or Stunned. Additionally, each time the Blaster attacks with a primary or secondary power, they gain a stacking damage bonus for the next 7.5 seconds. The amount of the damage bonus is dependent on the exact power used, with single target abilities generally giving the largest bonus.

name: Defiance_v2
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Defiance_Buff
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Defiance_Dampen
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Rage
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Rage_Buff
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Rage_Strengthen
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Rage_Dampen
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Rage_Proc_Grant
display_help: As a Brute engages in combat, it unleashes his Fury. The longer he remains in combat, attacking and being attacked, the more damage he deals.

name: Supremacy
display_help: A good Mastermind knows how to manage his Henchmen. The Mastermind imparts a bonus to his Henchmen's Accuracy and Damage only if he is nearby and not Phased or otherwise can only use Self Only powers. Additionally, your Henchmen within range in Defensive mode will share damage with the Mastermind, with damage being divided evenly between the Mastermind and each one of his Henchmen in range.

name: Scourge
display_help: The Corruptor is a dastardly villain indeed. As a Corruptor's foe health wanes, the Corruptor can start to land Scourge Hits with his attack powers for up to Double Damage. The weaker the target is, the greater chance the Corruptor has on landing Scourge. Once a foe is weak enough, there is no escaping the Corruptors wrath. The Corruptor shows no mercy.

name: Critical_Hit
display_help: The Scrapper is a fierce melee combatant. In hand to hand, no other hero can compare. All Scrapper melee attacks have a chance to land a Critical Hit for up to Double Damage. The higher the rank of the target, the greater the chance for a successful Critical Hit.

name: Assassination
display_help: A Stalker does his best work when attacking from ambush. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. Assassin Strikes made from hide will Demoralize the Stalker's foes leaving them with a reduced chance to hit and has a chance to terrorize them. Additionally, a Stalker has a 10 percent base chance to critically hit, which is increased by an additional 3 percent per member in your party, against non-player enemies. Stalkers have a chance to land a critical hit against players if they are Held or Slept. Each of the Stalker's damaging powers within their primary power set, other than Assassin's Strike, have a chance to grant the Stalker a stack of Assassin's Focus. Each stack of this buff boosts Assassin's Strike's chance to critically (hit while the user is not hidden) by 33.3%. Assassin's Focus stacks up to 3 times.

name: Containment
display_help: Controllers are the masters at locking down and controlling their opponents. Few can escape their will. Controllers do extra damage to any target that is already Held, Immobilized, Slept, or Disoriented.

name: Scrutiny
display_help: By carefully striking at their foes, Sentinels work towards creating opportunistic attacks that can weaken their foes or grant themselves a chance to recoup. Any enemy that a Sentinel focuses attacks on will be easier to hit and will suffer an additional 5% damage from incoming attacks. Multiple Sentinels can work together to make this effect stronger. Occasionally, the Sentinel may find an extreme vulnerability in a target that can be exploited to deliver up to 25% additional damage against it for a limited time. Only one such extreme vulnerability may be exploited at a time.

name: Scrutiny_Meter
display_help: By carefully striking at their foes, Sentinels work towards creating opportunistic attacks that can weaken their foes or grant themselves a chance to recoup. Any enemy that a Sentinel focuses attacks on will be easier to hit and will suffer an additional 5% damage from incoming attacks. Multiple Sentinels can work together to make this effect stronger. Occasionally, the Sentinel may find an extreme vulnerability in a target that can be exploited to deliver up to 25% additional damage against it for a limited time. Only one such extreme vulnerability may be exploited at a time.

name: Gauntlet
display_help: Although many may try, few can withstand the irresistible force of the Tanker. Each time a Tanker attacks, he enrages the target, and those around him, enticing them to attack the Tanker. Each punch continues to provoke your enemies and allows the Tanker to do what he does best. In addition, the area of your AoE attacks will be buffed. Cones will become wider, spheres larger, and chains reach further away.

name: Vigilance
display_help: The Defender's primary focus is to protect the team. When his allies are in danger, the Defender is able to look deep within him or herself and rise to the occasion. As a Defender's teammates are in danger of being defeated, the Defender gains an Endurance Discount and can activate their powers at a reduced cost. The more teammates in trouble, the greater the discount. A defender on a small team or by himself has more freedom to concentrate on his enemies, which allows him to increase his damage output by up to 30%. Each team member reduces this by 10%, to a minimum of no buff at all.

name: Vigilance_PerTeamEndAdjustment
display_help: The Defender's primary focus is to protect the team. When his allies are in danger, the Defender is able to look deep within him or herself and rise to the occasion. As a Defender's teammates are in danger of being defeated, the Defender gains an Endurance Discount and can activate their powers at a reduced cost. The more teammates in trouble, the greater the discount. A defender on a small team or by himself has more freedom to concentrate on his enemies, which allows him to increase his damage output by up to 30%. Each team member reduces this by 10%, to a minimum of no buff at all.

name: Domination_Rage
display_help: Nothing delights a Dominator more than inflicting pain. Each time a Dominator attacks, their sadistic nature grows. When your Domination bar is over 90%, you can activate this power to unleash their true potential. Your control powers will typically last 50 percent longer and will more easily Dominate stronger opponents. Additionally, you will fully recharge your Endurance and gain resistance to status protection.

name: Domination_Meter
display_help: Nothing delights a Dominator more than inflicting pain. Each time a Dominator attacks, their sadistic nature grows. When your Domination bar is over 90%, you can activate this power to unleash their true potential. Your control powers will typically last 50 percent longer and will more easily Dominate stronger opponents. Additionally, you will fully recharge your Endurance and gain resistance to status protection.

name: Domination_Boost
display_help: Nothing delights a Dominator more than inflicting pain. Each time a Dominator attacks, their sadistic nature grows. When your Domination bar is over 90%, you can activate this power to unleash their true potential. Your control powers will typically last 50 percent longer and will more easily Dominate stronger opponents. Additionally, you will fully recharge your Endurance and gain resistance to status protection.

name: Domination_Mode
display_help: Nothing delights a Dominator more than inflicting pain. Each time a Dominator attacks, their sadistic nature grows. When your Domination bar is over 90%, you can activate this power to unleash their true potential. Your control powers will typically last 50 percent longer and will more easily Dominate stronger opponents. Additionally, you will fully recharge your Endurance and gain resistance to status protection.

name: Domination
display_help: Nothing delights a Dominator more than inflicting pain. Each time a Dominator attacks, their sadistic nature grows. When your Domination bar is over 90%, you can activate this power to unleash their true potential. Your control powers will typically last 50 percent longer and will more easily Dominate stronger opponents. Additionally, you will fully recharge your Endurance and gain resistance to status protection. Recharge: Long

name: Domination_Dampen
display_help: Nothing delights a Dominator more than inflicting pain. Each time a Dominator attacks, their sadistic nature grows. When your Domination bar is over 90%, you can activate this power to unleash their true potential. Your control powers will typically last 50 percent longer and will more easily Dominate stronger opponents. Additionally, you will fully recharge your Endurance and gain resistance to status protection.

name: Spider_Conditioning
display_help: Soldiers of Arachnos undergo intense physical training before leaving "boot camp." Those that survive have greater than average healing rates and tire less quickly than others.

name: Widow_Conditioning
display_help: Soldiers of Arachnos undergo intense physical training before leaving "boot camp." Those that survive have greater than average healing rates and tire less quickly than others.

name: Battle_Euphoria
display_help: While engaged in combat, Devoured become filled with endorphins and adrenaline, fueling their attacks and combat lust. Each time they attack or are attacked, they gain a bonus to attack damage.

name: Battle_Euphoria_Buff
display_help: While engaged in combat, Devoured become filled with endorphins and adrenaline, fueling their attacks and combat lust. Each time they attack or are attacked, they gain a bonus to attack damage.

name: Battle_Euphoria_Dampen
display_help: While engaged in combat, Devoured become filled with endorphins and adrenaline, fueling their attacks and combat lust. Each time they attack or are attacked, they gain a bonus to attack damage.

name: HAC__Standard
display_help: Hyper-Advanced Clockwork have three modes of Operation: Standard, Offensive Mode or Defensive Mode. These are controlled by a pair of Toggle powers. When neither is engaged, the HAC uses standard modifiers, which favor Buff, Debuff and Movement powers. If the Offense Mode toggle is engaged, then the focus shifts, becoming weaker to Buff, Debuff and Movement values, but Recharge, To Hit and Damage are increased. In Defensive Mode, the ATmods shift, becoming weaker to Buff, Debuff and Movement values, but stronger to Damage Resistances, Status changes and Regeneration. HAC's are harder to heal and are vulnerable to Electro-Magnetic effects.

name: HAC_Rez
display_help: If you are defeated , you activating this power which will restore you so you may continue the battle. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. You will be invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. Note that System Reboot is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Extremely Long

name: Primal_Energy_Dampen
display_help: You gain Primal Energy by using your Feral Might attack powers, however you lose 1 Primal Energy every 6 seconds.

name: Primal_Energy_Meter
display_help: Many of the Primalist's Attacks will grant you Primal Energy. This energy is spent to execute devastating attacks and debuffs as well as incredibly potent healing. It's important to note that some powers require 10 Primal Energy to activate while others will scale with the amount you have.
